questions.text: Why do many security experts recommend using a password manager?
answers: It allows you to reuse the same strong password on multiple accounts.
It can generate and store unique, complex passwords for each of your accounts.
It makes it unnecessary to use multi-factor authentication on important accounts.
It automatically makes any short password secure, even if it is easy to guess.
